thread.title: Prithviraj requested me to join Moideen
thread.title_full: Prithviraj requested me to join Moideen - The Times of India

author: Deepa Soman
title: Prithviraj requested me to join Moideen
text:
M Jayachandran's tender love ballad 'Kaathirunnu Kaathirunnu' for the film Ennu Ninte Moideen was immediately lapped up by die-hard romantics, as it aptly portrays the pain of Kanchana's and Moideen's relationship.
The composer said in a recent interview that it is Prithviraj who requested him to score for the film. While Jayachandran apparently expressed concern over the fact that the movie also has Ramesh Narayanan's songs, the Hindustani musician called him up and said that shouldn't be a problem. All the songs of the film became chart busters soon after its release.
